item.title: Understand GLM -- Part1 Assumptions
item.description: This series of posts are inspired by my friends Mehrnaz and Anthi during a coffee chat. Quick Overview of Comparing Defining Features between GLM and Linear regression (reference): Linear Regression (ANOVA, ANCOVAâ€¦) Residuals of dependent variable are normally distributed All coefficient estimates, means, residual variance are calculated by OLS (ordinary least squares). (This feature is important since some statistics are derived from OLS: R-squared, MSE) Generalized Linear Model Residuals of dependent variable are not necessarily normally distributed.
